about.details:
Incorporated in 2015, Proventus Agrochem Limited is an integrated health food brand. The company has its presence in the entire range of dry fruits, nuts, seeds, and berries. The product of company also includes various healthy snacking products across the value chain.

The motto of Proventus is to create expertise in healthy food products. They strive at building the revenue stream by moving across the value chain from origination to distribution and creating an integrated business model - from "farm to homes".

The company is attempting to fill the vacuum in the healthy snacking range in the Indian market, especially in the dry fruits, nuts, seeds, and berries category.

The products of the company are marketed under the brand - "ProV".

The product range of Proventus Agrochem Limited includes Nuts, Dry Fruits, Seeds, and Berries like:

  • Almonds
  • Pistachios
  • Cashews
  • Walnuts
  • Raisins
  • Other Nuts, Dry Fruits, Seeds and Berries

The Group Proventus Agrochem Limited operates through its Material Subsidiaries like Prov Foods Private Limited, and Proventus Retail Private Limited.

faqs.question: What is the Proventus Agrocom IPO?
faqs.answer:
Proventus Agrocom IPO is a SME IPO of 901920 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹69.54 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹771 per share. The minimum order quantity is 160.

The IPO opens on May 24, 2023, and closes on May 26, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Proventus Agrocom IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Proventus Agrocom IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Proventus Agrocom IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Proventus Agrocom IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Proventus Agrocom IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Proventus Agrocom IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Proventus Agrocom IPO opens on May 24, 2023 and closes on May 26, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Proventus Agrocom IPO?
faqs.answer: Proventus Agrocom IPO lot size is 160, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,23,360.

faqs.question: How to apply for Proventus Agrocom IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Proventus Agrocom IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Proventus Agrocom IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Proventus Agrocom IPO will be done on Wednesday, May 31, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, June 2, 2023. Check the Proventus Agrocom IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Proventus Agrocom IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Proventus Agrocom IPO listing date is on Monday, June 5, 2023.
